<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 12"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Champion's Sacrifice](/Feats.aspx?ID=5915) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Champion" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=811" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 98 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Prerequisites**
you aren't unholy

</column>

---

You can suffer so that others might live. You can cast the [_champion's sacrifice_](/Spells.aspx?ID=2050) devotion spell.
name: Champion's Sacrifice
